examples.text: I can't believe he got that money honestly.

definitions.definition: used to emphasize that what you are saying is true, however surprising it may seem

examples.text: I honestly can't remember a thing about last night.
You can't honestly expect me to believe that!

definitions.definition: used to show that you think something is bad and are annoyed by it

examples.text: Honestly! Whatever will they think of next?
